metadata.Title: CVE-2022-42823 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixed in tvOS 16.1, macOS Ventura 13, watchOS 9.1, Safari 16.1, iOS 16.1 and iPadOS 16. Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution.

notes.Note: jdstrand> webkit receives limited support. For details, see https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SecurityTeam/FAQ#webkit webkit in Ubuntu uses the JavaScriptCore (JSC) engine, not V8

criterions.comment: qtwebkit-opensource-src package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-source package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in bionic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
webkitgtk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
